name: MTLAttributeDescriptor
desc: An object that describes an argument's format and where its data is in memory.

items.name: var bufferIndex: Int
items.desc: The index in the argument table for the buffer that contains the data for the attribute.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: The offset of the data from the start of the buffer data.

items.name: var format: MTLAttributeFormat
items.desc: The format of the attribute's data.

items.name: enum MTLAttributeFormat
items.desc: Values that specify the organization of function attribute data.
